Please make sure to fill out both fields with valid credential to sign in. Or Register as new user if you dont have an account.
Please make sure to fill all the fields and try again
Please make sure to connect to internet to register and try again!
You are registered as the coach and the administrator
Adminstrator not set! please set administrator!
Registration was not successfull, please make sure you are connected to internet and try again!.
Some of the fields are not filled in. Please fill in all the fields and try again
Sign in failured. Please check you typed right email and password, and make sure you are connected to internet, and try again.
Activity has not been registered! Check your internet connection and try again.
Post owners id could not be fetched from the database. please check your internet connection and try again.
Edited activity could not be set. Check you internet connection and try again.

Your post will be registered into the database withing 24 hour after you posted it and then will automatically be removed from here. Choose \"Delete\" if you want to cancel registration. You can register personal training any time.
Your post is deleted. You can add new post any time.
Here every player registers their personal sport activity after they have completed, or before starting. All personal trainings will be logged to a logg book of the coach.
